item.title: Asynchronous Processing using Event Triggers
item.description: Gists September 21, 2018 Published. Kanshi Tanaike Overview This is a report about the possibility of asynchronous process using event triggers. Description onEdit() which is a simple trigger is often used as a trigger when the values are modified on Spreadsheet. When users want to use the script including some methods which are required to be authorized as the onEdit event, a installable trigger of onEdit is used.
